alert.note: Alert for Runnels (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 07 at 5:13PM CDT until May 07 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL CALLAHAN...SOUTHEASTERN TAYLOR AND NORTH CENTRAL RUNNELS COUNTIES... At 513 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bradshaw, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Lawn around 520 PM CDT. Tuscola around 530 PM CDT. Buffalo Gap around 540 PM CDT. Wylie and Dudley around 550 PM CDT. Potosi around 600 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lake Abilene, Drasco, Camp Tonkawa, Pumphrey and Ovalo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
